comment._content: Rachel Wilson Breadon (1888-1964), second wife of Sam Breadon. Her husband was a baseball executive: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Breadon thedeadballera.com/Obits/Owners/Breadon.Sam.Obit.html www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=14996747
